channel.title: Project pvperfect
channel.description:
[u][b][center]Project pvperfect[/center][/b][/u]
Hi. My name is bill. Bill and Bill only please.
This thread is a serious thread. no jokers please.
[img]http://farm1.static.flickr.com/185/376204528_5f1e15d57e.jpg[/img]
To fill you in this is my project:
1. Take a base. In this case Whitescape. Clean it out, remove TPC. [b]This is done[/b] Features: - Logging in almost perfect - Walking - Running almost perfect - Banking nearly 100% - A few handellers.... - Shops - Npcs (need perfecting)
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/2vxmyi0.jpg[/img]
2. (this is where you come in)
Make a perfect combat base aka Attacking, Ranging and Magic.
- Player v player - Player v NPC - 100% perfect like Final Devolution 2.7 - NPC v NPC - Multiplayer PVP - Perfect specials
Stabilise it a bit.
So basically it will be clean, Stable and have only combat. This will be PERFECT for what people will want!
BUT why will people choose this?
Ill tell you why.
1. Hyperion and other fantastically clean servers people dont bother to use.
2. If its packaged, it fails unless its final devo...
3. People are shit lazy.
4. Perfect combat = what people want.
5. final devo is shit except its combat.
JOIN NOW!!!
Fill in this form and leave as a reply!!!
[code]Name: Group: Experience: Online a Day(Hrs): How to contact me(put email, msn etc):[/code]
*~bill~*

item.title: Project pvperfect
item.dc:creator: @cows1471 cows1471
item.description:
@cows1471 wrote:

[center]Project pvperfect[/center]

Hi. My name is bill. Bill and Bill only please.

This thread is a serious thread. no jokers please.

To fill you in this is my project:

  1. Take a base. In this case Whitescape. Clean it out, remove TPC. This is done
    Features:
  • Logging in almost perfect
  • Walking
  • Running almost perfect
  • Banking nearly 100%
  • A few handellers…
  • Shops
  • Npcs (need perfecting)

  1. (this is where you come in)

Make a perfect combat base aka Attacking, Ranging and Magic.

  • Player v player
  • Player v NPC - 100% perfect like Final Devolution 2.7
  • NPC v NPC
  • Multiplayer PVP
  • Perfect specials

Stabilise it a bit.

So basically it will be clean, Stable and have only combat. This will be PERFECT for what people will want!

BUT why will people choose this?

Ill tell you why.

  1. Hyperion and other fantastically clean servers people dont bother to use.

  2. If its packaged, it fails unless its final devo…

  3. People are shit lazy.

  4. Perfect combat = what people want.

  5. final devo is shit except its combat.

JOIN NOW!!!
